cont.entity_a: Lightweight and mostly out of plastic.
Not supported on the Nikon D5600, requiring manual focus. AF is slow and noisy since it relies on the camera motor. Compatibility requires a camera with a focusing motor.
cont.entity_b: Well-built. AF is a little slow.

cont.entity_a: Incredibly sharp with great bokeh. Sharp even at maximum aperture. Produces sharp images with fast and accurate focus.
cont.entity_b: Soft at 28mm but sharpens from 50mm-80mm. Best used around f/11 for sharpness.

cont.entity_a: Great for portraits and low light situations.
Optical quality is good, but build quality is poor. Focus ring is plastic and feels a little cheap.
cont.entity_b: Not a professional lens but suitable for everyday amateur use.

cont.entity_a: Good price value, especially for crop sensor cameras. Great price for the performance offered.

cont.entity_b: Reasonable for indoor, portrait, landscape, and architecture photography. Works well for close-ups and landscapes.

cont.entity_a: Does not include a lens protector.
cont.entity_b: General use lens with acceptable performance.
